content:
<rule id="embedded-framework-08200" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <dependency artifactId="spring-beans" groupId="org.springframework"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - Spring DI">
                    <description>The application embeds a Spring DI library.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Spring DI</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
